item.description:
About Me Link to heading

Hey, I’m Juan, but you can call me Gozes! Welcome to my little corner of the internet. I’m a software engineer with over six years of experience, primarily diving deep into the world of cloud computing and building robust, event-driven systems. My journey has also led me through the fascinating realm of data engineering, where I’ve wrangled big data using tools like DBT, SQL, and Spark. Day-to-day, you’ll find me working with Go, Python, SQL, Docker, and Kubernetes â€“ technologies I’ve grown to love (most of the time!).
